name: New Frontier (itch) (niekmeffert)
description:
This is a vertical slice of the third person action RPG New Frontier. You play as Abigail Torres newly appointed commander of a ragtag team set out to resolve a hostage situation on one of the outer planets, but things turn out to be less straight forward then first assumed. The game is set in a distant future where humanity as managed to expand out into the milky way and are now in the middle of the great expanse.

I have been developing this prototype for the last 5 months, focusing primarily on the characters, animations and overall worldbuilding together with the dialogue system.

The next step in the process will be to implement the combat and questing mechanics which can be followed on Instagram https://www.instagram.com/niekmeffert/.
